snippet: With their college applications submitted, high school seniors and their families will now take out their calculators (and tax forms), roll up their sleeves, and begin filling out financial aid forms. The Choice announces a forum to field reader...
abstract: With their college applications submitted, high school seniors and their families will now take out their calculators (and tax forms), roll up their sleeves, and begin filling out financial aid forms. The Choice announces a forum to field reader questions, and provide answers.
lead_paragraph: 10:23 a.m. | Updated We are no longer accepting questions for this feature.

headline.main: Seeking Your Questions on the Fafsa, the Free Application for Federal Student Aid
